text: The 2020 Copa Libertadores final stages were played from 24 November 2020 to 30 January 2021. A total of 16 teams competed in the final stages to decide the champions of the 2020 Copa Libertadores, with the final played in Lisbon, Portugal at the Estádio da Luz. The final stages had been originally scheduled to be played from 21 July to 21 November 2020, but were postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Round of 16== The single-legs were played on 24–27 November and 1–4 December. |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Quarter-finals== The single legs were played on 9–12 December 2020. |} \---- \---- \---- ==Semi-finals== The single legs were played on 5 and 6 January 2021. |} \---- ==Final== The final was played on 30 January 2021 at the Estádio da Luz in Lisbon. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== *CONMEBOL Libertadores 2020, CONMEBOL.com *3 Category:November 2020 events Category:December 2020 events Category:January 2021 events Category:2020 in South America Category:2021 in South America Category:2020 in association football Category:2021 in association football
title: 2020 Copa Libertadores final stages
